guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
No, you won‚Äôt get any useful source at all reporting this because some random charity director with a theology degree isn‚Äôt in any way qualified to assess the feelings of a world leader he‚Äôs never even met. 

Do you have any idea how asinine this sounds? I realize this is a lot like trying to convince a wall to move out of the way except with even less chance of success, since this narrative is wrapped so neatly into a Christianity good:China bad package for maximum digestibility, but at least *try* to look at this situation objectively. Would you take the word of a BLM chapter head insisting that Trump was terrified of Black people? It‚Äôs literally no different.
body_html:
No, you won‚Äôt get any useful source at all reporting this because some random charity director with a theology degree isn‚Äôt in any way qualified to assess the feelings of a world leader he‚Äôs never even met.

Do you have any idea how asinine this sounds? Would you take the word of a BLM chapter head insisting that Trump was terrified of Black people? It‚Äôs literally no different.

body:
I was just reading Acts 3-5 last night where this very thing starts happening. 

The Sanhedrin: ‚Äúwe will flog you instead of killing you, so now you must stop doing miracles in Jesus‚Äôs name.‚Äù 

Apostles: ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù 

Sanhedrin: ‚ÄúBut we killed him and we thought it would make this Jesus stuff go away. ‚Äú

Apostles: ‚ÄúHe lives.‚Äù

Sanhedrin: [shit]

"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God.

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
guild.name: Christianity

post.body: XI JINPING is terrified by the rise of the Christian church in China and may be forced to share power if it grows too large.
